edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene
Class SegmentView

java.lang.Object
  Node
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene.SceneObjectView
          edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene.SegmentView

public class SegmentView
extends SceneObjectView

The visual representation of a segment or segment group. Currently this can either be as a line segment, or as a cylinder.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)

Method Summary
 boolean containsCurrentGeometry(Geometry g)
          Tests if the Geometry g is inside the current visualization of this ISegmentView
 boolean correspondsToSegment()
          If true, it means that this object represents a single segment
 boolean correspondsToSegmentGroup()
          If true, it means that this object represents multiple segments in a group.
 Vector3f getApex()
          Gets a vector corresponding to the top of this segment, or the top of the top most segment, if multiple segments are used.
 Vector3f getBase()
          Gets a vector corresponding to the bottom of this segment or the bottom of the bottom most segment, if multiple segments are used.
 ISegment getCorrespondingSegment()
          Returns the single segment this object represents, if it does only represent a single segment
 ISegmentGroup getCorrespondingSegmentGroup()
          Returns the multiple segments this object represents, if it represents multiple segments
